title: Are Renekton or Shen worth getting?
body: I was told in the last thread I posted that I needed a few more champions before I should start buying more runes again. I have a total of 19 champions right now, and all of them except Garen use mana. So, I'm thinking about getting a manaless champion next. I'm thinking between Renekton and Shen, so which one is better to get right now? Which one is more versatile? Any other advice ?
